ability.Regenerative Spikes: On switch-in, this Pokemon is covered with spikes. It restores 1/10 of its max HP at the end of each turn if its spikes are intact.
ability.Spike Burst: When this Pokemon's spikes are broken, it releases damage to all opponents of 1/8 of their max HP and lowers their Defense by 1 stage.

Spike Slam.effect: If the user's spikes are intact, break the spikes, dealing additional damage of 1/16 of the target's max HP.

Dragon Dive.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 of the damage dealt.

Regenerate.effect: The user heals 50% of its max HP and regenerates spikes if broken.

Dragon Dance.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.
